meta.settings.github_token.label: GitHub Token
meta.settings.github_token.description: Personal access token fer GitHub API. Required fer repo work like creatin' branches an' pull requests.
meta.settings.github_repository.label: GitHub Repository
meta.settings.github_repository.descript: The repo t' work with in format 'owner/repo' (e.g., 'meuser/meproject').
meta.settings.openai_api_key.label: OpenAI API Key
meta.settings.openai_api_key.description: API key fer OpenAI services. Used fer AI-driven code makin' an' analysis.
meta.settings.litellm_api_key.label: LiteLLM API Key
meta.settings.litellm_api_key.descriptio: Alternative API key if ye be usin' the LiteLLM proxy fer many LLM providers.
meta.settings.log_level.label: Log Level
meta.settings.log_level.description: Controls how much detail be written to logs. DEBUG shows everythin', ERROR shows only errors.
meta.settings.app_lang.label: App Language
meta.settings.app_lang.description: Language fer bot messages an' UI text.
meta.settings.prompt_path.label: Prompt File Path
meta.settings.prompt_path.description: Path to the YAML file holdin' the system prompt setup.
meta.settings.web_user.label: Web UI Username
meta.settings.web_user.description: Username fer accessin' the web dashboard. Leave empty t' disable authentication.
meta.settings.web_password.label: Web UI Password
meta.settings.web_password.description: Password fer accessin' the web dashboard. Leave empty t' disable authentication.
